titleStmt.title: A declaration concerning His Majesties Royall Person, touching his present Resolution and Condition. And a copy of the Scots representation, humbly tendered to His Sacred Majesty in the name of the whole kingdom of Scotland, concerning the proceedings of the Parliament of England. As also, the copy of a letter to Windsor, touching the great rising in the west, viz. in Gloucester-shire, Hampshire, and Wilt-shire.

notesStmt.note: With portrait of Charles I on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
